name: Wheelmen City
description:
Wheelman City is a 3D multiplayer driving game.
It is currently a prototype and multiplayer might not work sometimes.
Controls:
WASD/Arrows - Move
G - Respawn
Shift - Nitro
Esc - Back to Main Menu
Tips:
- Make sure you stop the host before pressing esc
-Windows Defender Firewall might block private network multiplayer.
